column1: This paper reports on the results of an 18-month consensus building process wherein the Early Psychological Intervention Subcommittee (EPI) of the National Voluntary Organizations Active in Disaster (NVOAD) formulated recommendations on the nature of disaster mental_health interventions and, what, if any, specialized training should individuals receive in preparation to perform early psychological intervention in the wake of disasters?
